subsection_analysis.refined_text: o 2 eggplants o Assorted small side dishes like pickled radish, spinach, bean sprouts, kimchi • Instructions: o Prepare each side dish separately. o Serve as accompaniments to the main meal. o Arrange on small plates. Banh Beo • Ingredients: o 1 cup rice flour o 1/2 cup water o 1/2 cup coconut milk

Fruit and Nut Bars Ingredients: • 1 cup dates, pitted • 1 cup mixed nuts • 1/4 cup dried fruit • 1 tablespoon honey Instructions: • In a food processor, combine dates, mixed nuts, dried fruit, and honey. • Serve immediately. • Serve immediately. • Serve immediately. • Season with salt and pepper. • In a bowl, combine cottage cheese, cucumber, cherry tomatoes, and bell pepper. • In a blender, combine frozen berries, spinach, Greek yogurt, almond milk, and honey. • Blend until smooth.

o Simmer for 10 minutes. o Add bulgur and cook for 2 minutes. o Add soy sauce and cook for 2 minutes. Banchan • Ingredients: o Assorted small side dishes like pickled radish, spinach, bean sprouts, kimchi • Instructions: o Prepare each side dish separately. o Bake for 30 minutes until set and golden. o Bake for 45 minutes until vegetables are tender. o Add cumin, coriander, turmeric, and garam masala, cook for 1 minute. o Add lemongrass, chilies, and tamarind paste, simmer for 10 minutes. o Wrap in cheesecloth and hang in a cool, dry place for 1-2 weeks.

Banh Beo • Ingredients: o 1 cup rice flour o 1 pound beef tenderloin o 1/4 cup paprika o 2 tablespoons cumin o 2 tablespoons fenugreek o 1 tablespoon garlic powder o 1 tablespoon salt • Instructions: o Rub beef with salt and let cure in the refrigerator for 24 hours. o Slice thinly and serve. o Serve warm.
